name: copy a request parameter to user property
description: Copies request parameter to a user property

parameters.name: Request parameter name
parameters.description: The name of the request parameter to read

parameters.name: User property name
parameters.description: The name of the user property to write

parameters.name: Session property name
parameters.description: The name of the session property to write

parameters.name: Store as a list ?
parameters.description: If true, the values will be stored in a list
